channel.title: 1234's Server tool package in a batch file!
channel.description:
Hi, this is my first version of this program.
More features will be in this when I release v1.2
Add this code into a batch file or make a new : [code]@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this compiler echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.2 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.[/code]
It MUST be put in your server folder to be used properly.
Credits 100% me

item.title: 1234's Server tool package in a batch file!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

newton37:

wow nice, it creates run.bat, autospawn.cfg , and shops2.cfg. the run client.java thing doesnt work =\

Lol? For a run.bat just do;

@ECHO OFF JAVA (MainClass)
Also, their isn’t any batch files aloud.

Read full topic
item.source: 1234's Server tool package in a batch file!

item.title: 1234's Server tool package in a batch file!

item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Thanks, ill add more features in my free time when making v1.2

And the running client.java thing. I’ll work on that

Updates in V1.2 :
Make a new compiler.bat
Character deleter
Convertion .class to .jar
Run client.java
Run autospawn.cfg
Run shops.cfg
Run server.java
C O M P I L E R!!

item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Hi, this is my first version of this program.

More features will be in this when I release v1.2

Add this code into a batch file or make a new :

@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :menu title 1234's All-in-one echo Hello and thank you for using 1234's All-in-1 that was made from scratch echo Choose your option below : echo. echo S - To make a new runserver ( run.bat ) echo C - To make a new shop ( shops2.cfg ) echo R - To run your server echo E - To exit this compiler echo J - To run Client.java ( under construction ) echo A - To make a new autospawn ( autospawn2.cfg ) echo. set /p c=Option ? if %c%==S goto rock if %c%==s goto rock if %c%==C goto shops2 if %c%==c goto shops2 if %c%==R goto runserver if %c%==r goto runserver if %c%==E goto exit if %c%==e goto exit if %c%==J goto java if %c%==j goto java if %c%==a goto file if %c%==A goto file pause cls :rock cls echo. >>"run.bat" echo Run.bat has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. echo. pause cls goto menu :shops2 cls echo. >>"shops2.cfg" echo. [ Shops2 by 1234 ] >>"shops2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. :runserver cls title Runserver echo Loading server.... echo. java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls echo. pause cls goto menu :file cls echo. >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo. [ Autospawn2 by 1234 ] >>"autospawn2.cfg" echo The file has been made. echo It is now in your Server folder. pause cls goto menu :java cls echo client.java is loading.. java -cp .client cls goto menu pause cls :exit cls title exit echo Thank you for at least using 1234's all-in-one program. echo V1.2 is coming soon, stay tuned! pause cls goto lol :lol This section will close the file.

It MUST be put in your server folder to be used properly.

Credits 100% me
